alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 1:39PM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow showers, moderate to heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the valleys, with 6 inches to a foot in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
